sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Remove master text in label and replace it with main text</description>
        <name>Fix Rename Master to Main</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function () {
	var sgr = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
	sgr.addQuery("name", "sys_hub_flow");
	sgr.addQuery("element", "master_snapshot");
	sgr.query();
	if (sgr.next()) {
		sgr.column_label = "Main snapshot";
		sgr.setWorkflow(false);
		sgr.update();
	}
	sgr = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
	sgr.addQuery("name", "sys_hub_action_type_definition");
	sgr.addQuery("element", "master_snapshot");
	sgr.query();
	if (sgr.next()) {
		sgr.column_label = "Main snapshot";
		sgr.setWorkflow(false);
		sgr.update();
	}
	sgr = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
	sgr.addQuery("name", "sys_hub_flow_snapshot");
	sgr.addQuery("element", "master");
	sgr.query();
	if (sgr.next()) {
		sgr.column_label = "Main";
		sgr.setWorkflow(false);
		sgr.update();
	}
	sgr = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
	sgr.addQuery("name", "sys_hub_action_type_snapshot");
	sgr.addQuery("element", "master");
	sgr.query();
	if (sgr.next()) {
		sgr.column_label = "Main";
		sgr.setWorkflow(false);
		sgr.update();
	}
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-11-10 00:12:15</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2fa764c3ff1020107f944ee9453bf1a4</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Fix Rename Master to Main</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Flow Designer Designer Model" source="com.glide.hub.designer_backend.model">ffe9f8683cf1311068bcf327dfe37fdf</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_2fa764c3ff1020107f944ee9453bf1a4</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-11-10 02:21:02</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
